amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new subsection within paragraph (2) to increase in Federal lands described in paragraph (1) that have no or low potential for oil and gas development.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to ensure that the Federal Government is not forced to lease public lands with low or no potential for oil and gas development to the fossil fuel industry as a result of this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 221 (Roll no. 78).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mrs. Lee (NV).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 221 (Roll no. 78).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
